app.name: Morning Golden Time
app.tagline: Transform your morning into golden moments

welcome.title: What is Golden Routine?
welcome.description: A morning routine that protects your brain's creative {theta} and {alpha} states, prevents dopamine addiction, and helps you achieve both wealth and mental abundance.

step1.title: Digital Detox
step1.subtitle: Theta State Protection
step1.description: Protect your brain's creative theta and alpha wave states by avoiding digital stimulation right after waking up.
step1.fact: 70-80% of people check their phone within 10 minutes of waking up, which shifts the brain into reactive beta state.
step1.commitText: I will not check my phone for the next 30 minutes
step1.timerComplete: Excellent! You protected your theta state!

step2.title: Set Intentions
step2.subtitle: Setting Intentions & Affirmations
step2.description: Before coffee or news, set your purpose for the day. Affirmations work on your subconscious to guide your brain toward your goals.
step2.feelingLabel: How do I want to feel today?
step2.goalLabel: What is my core goal for today?

goals.2: Focus on deep work for 2 hours

step2.affirmationPlaceholder: e.g., I attract positive energy and opportunities

affirmations.1: I expect good things to happen today
affirmations.2: I am grateful for this new day
affirmations.3: I have the power to create change
affirmations.5: I am becoming the best version of myself

step3.title: Light & Mood
step3.subtitle: Syncing Light & Mood
step3.description: Sunlight helps produce serotonin and regulates melatonin. Plan your natural light exposure for the day.

suggestions.sunny: Great day for outdoor activities! Try to get 20-30 minutes of morning sunlight.
suggestions.cloudy: Even on cloudy days, outdoor light is beneficial. Consider a walk.
suggestions.rainy: Indoor exercise or light therapy can help on rainy days.
suggestions.default: Plan some time near windows or outdoors today.

step4.title: Inner Ritual
step4.subtitle: Ritualizing the Self
step4.description: Horoscopes provide psychological comfort during uncertain times. Connect this with journaling or meditation.
step4.journalPlaceholder: Write down any thoughts that come to mind this morning...

horoscopes.1: Today is a great day to start new challenges. Don't be afraid.
horoscopes.2: Patience will bring good results. Trust the process.
horoscopes.3: Communication with others may bring you luck.
horoscopes.4: Take some time today to focus on yourself.
horoscopes.5: Unexpected good news may come your way.
horoscopes.6: Starting the day with gratitude brings more abundance.

step5.title: Personal Tasks
step5.subtitle: Personal Tasks First
step5.description: Complete personal tasks before work begins. Morning accomplishments create positive momentum for the entire day.

step6.title: Market Check
step6.subtitle: Strategic Market Check
step6.description: Check news and markets last, after establishing emotional stability through your routine.
step6.warningText: Frequent portfolio checking can cause stress and emotional reactions to short-term volatility, potentially hurting returns. Investors who check less frequently often perform better.

principles.title: Mindful Viewing Principles
principles.1: I will observe, not react emotionally
principles.2: Short-term fluctuations don't define long-term success
principles.3: I've built emotional stability through my routine

checkOptions.title: What would you like to check?

step6.skipMessage: Skipping market check can reduce anxiety and improve focus. Great choice!

completion.title: Golden Routine Complete!
completion.subtitle: You've set yourself up for a successful day
completion.quote: The way you start your day determines how well you live your day.
